channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Eerie abandoned UK theme park soon to reopen for terrifying reason
item.description: The popular scare event is returning for its fifth instalment at the abandoned Camelot theme park in Chorley, Lancashire, bringing a world of terror to the North West this Halloween

item.title: Meet the man who builds giant versions of household items, because why not?
item.description: Steve Wainwright said his retirement from the ambulance service first prompted him to take on some ‘creative’ building projects.

item.title: HMP Wandsworth sex tape guard 'was being blackmailed after inmates found her OnlyFans'
item.description: Linda De Sousa Abreu pleaded guilty to misconduct after the explicit video of her having sex with an inmate, which had been filmed by a prisoner, was shared on social media

item.title: Sharks ‘high on cocaine’ after drugs are being flushed down the loo
item.description: It could be affecting their behaviour making them more aggressive.

item.title: 'Entitled sister-in-law stole my baby's name – I reserved it decades ago'
item.description: A woman has shared her outrage after learning her sister-in-law has 'stolen' her baby boy's name - making her wonder whether she did it on purpose since she knows she 'reserved' it

item.title: UK's 'equivalent to Salem' is magical town with dark witchy history
item.description: A seemingly-innocent village and fishing port in England has been branded the UK's 'equivalent to Salem' due to its connection to Joan Wytte, who was executed on suspicion of being a witch

item.title: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle's 'harrowing reason for reluctance to show Archie and Lilibet'
item.description: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle have highly guarded their children Prince Archie and Princess Lilibet's privacy with very few pictures of the youngsters being made public - and a friend of the couple has revealed the reason why
